Posts.Content: Shayhaze wrote: I have appointments in the waiting but we all know how hard waiting is, so 8 months ago I got a "virus " I started to throw up persistent nausea well 2 weeks go by I'm still sick but not as bad I vomit here and there and have persistent diarrhea dr. Says Prilosec. By now 8 months later , I have lost 30 pounds, I still get sick and rarely eat low energy , and the other morning I felt a sting in my breast and when I touched it I felt it...... An enormous lump the size of a golf ball, hard as a rock . I run to the bathroom to examine its pink and bruised looking I have small breast small b cups you can visually see the lump with your eye. I was wondering if it common to be sick like that before diagnosis . Log in to post a reply
